text:
MeetKai | Full-Time| ONSITE | Los Angeles | 60-140K + Equity for qualified candidates

We are a stealth startup in the AI space, we are backed by the founders of a 10bn cap company. If you have a passion for AI/ML then read on:

Shoot an email to hello@meetkai.com if you are interested and would like to hear more/applyâ€¦

Machine Learning Developer

* Do ASR/NLP/NLU mean something to you? If so then this is right up your alley.

* Experience with Python required

* Experience with TypeScript or strong desire to learn is a huge advantage

* Tensorflow exp preferred but not required

Full Stack Engineer:

* Experience with TypeScript/JS and/or Python required

* Experience with react native a huge plus
